name: Frosted Grass - Oxbow Bend, canvas giclée art print
description: "Traveling west again gave me a chance to see the spectacular variety in nature. Here grasses meet mountains and even though my time was brief I found the change between the last of fall and the first frosts to outline my subject. The original is 16x24. Giclées are produced by the artist, printed in pigment inks on archival canvas. In the process of adding originals to my online gallery at Check online Gallery store Check online fine art gallery http://deborahchapin.com/ This canvas print is ready for your framer. Features: Fine Art Canvas Giclee, Large - small size made to order by the artist printed in permanent pigment inks on archival canvas. Made to order giclees are printed on demand with the highest quality materials by the artist.  Deborah wanted to keep control of her quality of materials and the reproduction of truly beautiful colors.  Deborah is a long time professional artist who has lectured at the Smithsonian American Art Museum on color and plein air painting and has exhibited her works in museums worldwide. For more information about the artist see her online store at portfolio of fine art and her cv/biography also Check her fine art gallery selling originals at her website . Online art for sale, artwork and books by Deborah Chapin

name: Winter's Nap, Pigment Ink on Canvas Giclée
description:
The snow geese fly in and settle in for a winter's nap in their comfy spot in the Bay along the Atlantic Flyway.
Original is 16x34 Features: Fine Art Canvas Giclee, Large - small size made to order by the artist printed in permanent pigment inks on archival canvas. Made to order giclees are printed on demand with the highest quality materials by the artist.  Deborah wanted to keep control of her quality of materials and the reproduction of truly beautiful colors.  Deborah is a long time professional artist who has lectured at the Smithsonian American Art Museum on color and plein air painting and has exhibited her works in museums worldwide.  For more information about the artist see her online portfolio of fine art and her cv/biography Check her fine art gallery selling originals at her website http://www.deborahchapin.com. name: Ice Patterns, canvas giclée, Chesapeake Wetlands
description:
This piece was about the Eagle's comeback on the Bay. It has been a thrill for those of us connected in our work to the land. I have been able to see them from a distance but hopefully the numbers will continue to increase. The original was exhibited in the Paint America Competition. Original is available through my website see: Ice Patterns, 16x34 oil on linen canvas, original oil by Deborah Chapin Original oil painting size: 16x34, plein air oil painting + bird on linen canvas Features: Fine Art Canvas Giclee, Large - small size made to order by the artist printed in permanent pigment inks on archival canvas. Made to order giclees are printed on demand with the highest quality materials by the artist.  Deborah wanted to keep control of her quality of materials and the reproduction of truly beautiful colors.  Deborah is a long time professional artist who has lectured at the Smithsonian American Art Museum on color and plein air painting and has exhibited her works in museums worldwide.  For more information about the artist see her online portfolio of fine art and her cv/biography Check her fine art gallery selling originals at her website http://www.deborahchapin.com.
